short_summary: A breakwater access road project in Wedgeport, Nova Scotia, Canada. Estimated budget: between $1,000,001 to $5,000,000.
description: A breakwater access road project in Wedgeport, Nova Scotia, Canada. The Contractor must complete the work by Aug 30, 2023. This project will be conducted at the site and the work will involve the realignment and reconstruction of a breakwater access road. The contractor will be responsible for the completion of this project.
full_summary:
# ITQ - Breakwater Access Road Wedgeport Harbour

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3915270472-Doc3915633921
* **Tender ID**: WS3915270472
* **Publication Date**: March 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 30, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 14, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Project Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans – Small Craft Harbours (DFO-SCH) requires a contractor to realign and reconstruct the breakwater access road in Wedgeport, Yarmouth County, Nova Scotia. The project includes:

* Realignment and reconstruction of the breakwater access road
* Completion of the work by August 30, 2023

## Instructions to Bidders

* Site visit not scheduled; recommended for bidders to visit the site before submitting a bid
* All enquiries to be submitted to the Contracting Authority using the Messages function in SAP Ariba, with a minimum of five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date
* Proposals to be submitted via SAP Ariba only by 3:00 PM ADT on March 30, 2023
* The estimated cost of this procurement is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000

## Additional Information

* The RFP issuing office is Atlantic Region Acquisitions, 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, N.S., B3J 1T3
* This office provides services in English; proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
